name: FIVE STARS BROKER
goal:
FSB is a leading global brokerage company servicing the financial markets. We offer our customers access to more than 100 financial products including commodities, futures, commercial real estate, credit derivatives, equity derivatives, equities, foreign exchange, interest rate swap, fixed income securities and structured products.
We also provide a comprehensive range of services to the financial community, including trade execution, broker-dealer services, clearing, processing, information, and other back-office services.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Energy, Transport
euInitiatives: FSB takes an active interest in EU policy initiatives which shape the financial markets; both directly and indirectly. These include MIFID II, CSDR, CRDV, Capital Markets Union and the Investment Firm Review.
